short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Use AI search directly from the address bar

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
🤖 Claude AI at Your Fingertips: Instant AI Answers in Your Address Bar! Transform your Chrome address bar into an instant AI search.

🔍 How it works:

· Type "ai" in your address bar, then space and your chat search or prompt
· Claude instantly opens with your query and answer being generated

✨ Key Features:

· Seamless Integration: Use AI without leaving your current tab
· Lightning Fast: Get answers in seconds
· User-Friendly: As easy as typing a URL

🧠 Perfect for:

· Students researching topics
· Professionals seeking quick insights
· Curious minds with burning questions

💡 Boost your productivity and satisfy your curiosity with AI-powered answers, right from your address bar!

🔒 Privacy-Focused: Your queries are sent directly to the AI service, not stored by us.

🆓 Always Free: Enjoy unlimited AI assistance at no cost!

You will need a Anthropic / Claude account to use this extension.  

Install now and unlock the power of Claude AI in your browser! 🚀🧠💻
